name: Inner Paradise
description:
What beauty lurks beneath the surface, what paradise can be grown from the seedlings that sprout in thought? What sacrifice must we make to see our palace of the mind bloom? Explore your inner paradise and see.

A collaboration between Laurence Fuller and Mathijs. 

Acrylic and digital painting by Mathijs.

Original poem written by Laurence Fuller “The Actor & The Poet” - Produced and performed by Laurence Fuller 
@laurencefuller
